message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take 1000 and we'll call it a day!
Let's meet in the middle, Alice. We both get a good share, and we don't lose any more value to inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split it 60/40, and avoid further inflation.
Alice, considering the inflation is affecting you more, I think this split is fair. We should settle on this before the value drops further for you.
